page.title: 16Geography and Ecology.
page.content: Our area is one of great geographical and ecological interest.We are placed on a spur with{Portsmouth Water}to the East,{Southampton Water}to the West and{The Solent}separating us from The Isle of Wight. The area is very flat, receiving better than average hours of sunshine and a moderate climate.The soil is light and sandy, ideal for the growing of vegetables. Although our shores are used for a great many water sports,due to the nearby oil refinery and docks, the water is rather{polluted}and unsafe for swimming. Geographically the area has undergone {tremendous change}within the last century.There is little to remind us of the dense forest which once covered the area except for the proximity of the{New Forest}ten miles away.
